apple_vendor_description: This couple emoji on Apple devices features two individuals, one with a dark skin tone and the other with a medium-dark skin tone, standing closely together with a prominent, luminous heart between them. Apple's signature glossy finish and soft 3D shading bring the heart to life, symbolizing a strong and vibrant romantic connection. Their intertwined presence and the central heart convey deep affection, partnership, and shared love, a beautiful representation of love's diversity on Apple devices.
